values:
this week has been....interesting hahaha.

ice skating was fun. But ive got to go see the horrors this friday coz i promised B i would for her birthday...YUKKKKKKK i hate the horrors.

got paid yesterday and i am already 30quid overdrawn need to be more careful with my cash espesially if i want to go to this anime thing need to save now or i will never be able to afford it........and that would be BAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD.


word up homies..
xx
http://griffith2005.livejournal.com/4729.html

pshhhhhhh......so much for friends. kim said she would always be my friend no matter what but that has changed. she is now calling me a "dick head" on her my space for all to hear.

but its ok i dont blame her coz  pretty much am.

i went to asda tonite and bought 6 litres of cider i was going to save some for tomorrow but i drank it all.

oh well....lol.......just looks like i have lost another friend due to my gayness in relationships.......

got to say tho it was doomed from the start.

things havent been the same scince that day....i wish it was different but its not so theres nothing i can do but take it as it comes

really should go out driving withoout a licence.....

nearly got caught again tonight....reall close one like had to pull into my mates mums and sit off for a bit...

the police followed us for like 10 mins before we pulled up.

SCARY STUFF

OMG!!!!!! ive lost interest in everything......i mean everything.

sounds emo i know but who cares thats just the way i feel. everything is GAYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!.

but on the lighter note.....hot fuzz is out on valentines day so im going to watch that. nothing better than spending valantines day alone watching a film in the cinema...what a sad life i lead.

P.S i was drunk when i posted this so egnore me im gay.

i might just go gay lolz

man i need help i know i have a drinking problem but meh hat can you do......

if any one out there can help me pleae do because i really need it.... if not then......FUCK OFF coz thats just the way it goes




Much love xxxxxxxx

ohwell!!!! nearly another year has gone and its just another year of complete failure but what can ya do...... split up with my gf. Thats two break ups this year such joyous times *complete sacrasm* well not so much for splitting with kim. it wasn't going anywhere and probly neaver would and now i can stop stressing that i was treating her bad. but on the upside my alcoholism has increased wooohoooooooo...... downside chain smoking + asthma = much chest pain for me =D but hope everyone had a good xmas i did in parts. Goin richard on newyears day to get wasted so that will be much fun... heres to everyones health (not mine im practically dead lolz) sue me im emo
